Interface com.tektools.kawa.plugin.KawaEventListener

public interface KawaEventListener
Interface for all event listeners in Kawa

onEvent(KawaEvent)
Override onEvent to handle the message received by the listener.

onEvent 
 public abstract void onEvent(KawaEvent event)
Override onEvent to handle the message received by the listener. Cast the event object to the specific type of event class before using.

Parameters:
event - Kawaevent object
